description:
Marin and Urin are sea folk, people who live in the ocean. One day, a ring falls from the "sky" - that strange place above the water - and the two girls decide to find its owner. But while the surface holds many wonders, it also hides a great darkness...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heart of the Sea, Heart of the Sky
Umi no Kokoro Sora no Kokoro
